=BOILING ROASTING ETC.= THOROUGH PRACTICAL KNOWLEDGE PROCESSES DESCRIBED PRESENT CHAPTER FORM REALLY GOOD COOK FAR SOONER COMPLETELY ARRAY MERE RECEIPTS HOWEVER MINUTELY MAY EXPLAINED THEREFORE WELL STUDIED COMPREHENDED ATTEMPT MADE COMPOUND DIFFICULT DISHES PRINCIPLES ROASTING BOILING STEWING BAKING LEAST OUGHT CLEARLY UNDERSTOOD EVERY SERVANT UNDERTAKES DUTIES CALLED _PLAIN COOKERY_ FACT IMPORTANCE ALMOST UNIVERSAL REQUEST COUNTRY FAMILIES MODERATE FORTUNE PERSON EXCELS EASILY BECOME EXPERT CONSIDERED HIGHER BRANCHES ART VAST NUMBER ENGLISH KITCHENS COOKERY FAILS HURRIED MANNER CONDUCTED EXCESS HEAT PRODUCED ENORMOUS COAL-FIRES CONSTANTLY KEPT BURNING SEASONS WITHOUT IGNORANT SERVANTS IMAGINE DINNER PROPERLY COOKED MISTAKE FAIL QUICKLY BECOME APPARENT INEXPERIENCED READER GIVE PATIENT TRIAL SLOW METHODS COOKING RECOMMENDED FOLLOWING PAGES FOUND COMBINE EXCEEDING ECONOMY CONSUMPTION FUEL DEGREE SUPERIORITY FOOD PREPARED WOULD SCARCELY CREDITED UNLESS PUT TEST STEWING BAKING CLOSELY COVERED VESSELS SUPERIORITY PARTICULARLY REMARKABLE WOULD WILLINGLY GIVE FAR LARGER SPACE USEFUL SUBJECT LIMITS PERMIT HOWEVER COMPELLED THOUGH REGRET RESTRICT DETAILS SUPPLIED VARIOUS
